name: Zeroth Dragon of Distant Sea, Megiddo
effect:

Reveal up to five cards with "Shizuku" in their card names from your hand, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each card revealed, and your opponent cannot call cards from his or her hand with the same grade as the revealed cards to (GC) during the battle that this unit attacked.

effect:
[ACT](Hand):[Counter-Blast 1 & Call this card to (RC) & Choose a card from your hand, and return it to your deck] If your vanguard is grade 2 or greater, search your deck for up to one "Top Idol, Riviere", ride it on your (VC) as [Stand], if you rode from a grade 3 unit, choose up to one face down card with "Riviere" in its card name from your G zone, and [Stride] it on your (VC). Shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):[Soul-Blast 1] When your grade 4 vanguard with "Riviere" in its card name attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, [Stand] this unit.

name: Delight Genius, Ange
effect:
[AUTO](VC):[Soul-Blast 1] When this unit is placed on (VC), or when your G unit [Stride], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two cards in any player's circle other than (VC), and return them to hand. If one or more of your opponent's cards were returned, you draw a card. If one or more of your cards were returned, search your deck for up to one card with [Generation Break 2], reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC)[Generation Break 2]:When you would discard cards from hand for the cost of [Stride], you may call those cards to (RC) instead.

name: Velvet Voice, Raindear
effect:
[AUTO]:[Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] When your drive check reveals this card, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your units with "Raindear" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit is placed on (VC), or when your G unit [Stride], choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets "[AUTO](VC):When your drive check reveals a grade 3 card, all of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.".

name: Luxury Wave, Elly
effect:
[G Guardian](Usable when both fighters' vanguards are grade 3 or greater, and the number of face up G guardians in your G zone is three or less)-Opponent Turn's Guard Step-[Choose a card with "[Heal] Heal" from your hand, and discard it] Call this card to your (GC) from face down.
[CONT](GC):This unit gets [Shield] +10000 for each sentinel in your drop zone and each face up "Luxury Wave, Elly" in your G zone.
[AUTO][Generation Break 2]:[Soul-Blast 1] When this card is put into your G zone face up, you may pay the cost. If you do, turn this card face down.

name: Attractive Glow, Sandy
effect: [CONT](Hand):This card may be regarded as a card with "[Heal] Heal" for the cost to call a [G Guardian].

name: Transcend Idol, Aqua
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel. But if all the sentinels in your deck are "Transcend Idol, Aqua", you may include up to six.
[AUTO]:[Choose a card from your hand, and put it into your soul] When this unit is placed on (GC) from hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If the number of sentinels in your drop zone is two or more, choose all of your rear-guards, and they cannot be hit until end of turn.
